languages.text: {n}Угодив вам в рот, напиток словно превращается в кислоту — жидкость, прилипшая к слизистой, пытается прожечь ее насквозь. Вы надсадно кашляете, прикрыв горящий рот — на рукаве остаются капли крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Угодив вам в рот, напиток словно превращается в кислоту — жидкость, прилипшая к слизистой, пытается прожечь ее насквозь. Вы надсадно кашляете, прикрыв горящий рот — на рукаве остаются капли крови.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Угодив вам в рот, напиток словно превращается в кислоту — жидкость, прилипшая к слизистой, пытается прожечь ее насквозь. Вы надсадно кашляете, прикрыв горящий рот — на рукаве остаются капли крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn into acid — the liquid is stuck to your mucosa and is trying to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — a few drops of blood are left on the sleeve.{/n}

{n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn into acid — the liquid is stuck to your mucosa and is trying to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — a few drops of blood are left on the sleeve.{/n}

{n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

{n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

{n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

languages.text: {n}饮料刚一入口，就仿佛变成了酸液。液体粘在了你的喉咙内壁，仿佛要烧穿你的喉咙一样。你捂住了灼烧得发痛的嘴巴，猛烈地咳嗽起来，几滴血滴在了你的袖子上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}饮料刚一入口，就仿佛变成了酸液。液体粘在了你的喉咙内壁，仿佛要烧穿你的喉咙一样。你捂住了灼烧得发痛的嘴巴，猛烈地咳嗽起来，几滴血滴在了你的袖子上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La bebida, una vez que te la llevas a la boca, parece volverse ácida: el líquido se adhiere al revestimiento de tu garganta e intenta quemarla. Toses con violencia mientras te tapas la boca, que arde, y ves cómo un par de gotas de sangre caen sobre tu manga.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La bebida, una vez que te la llevas a la boca, parece volverse ácida: el líquido se adhiere al revestimiento de tu garganta e intenta quemarla. Toses con violencia mientras te tapas la boca, que arde, y ves cómo un par de gotas de sangre caen sobre tu manga.{/n}

languages.text: {n}口の中に入れた瞬間、液体は酸に変わった。液体が喉の粘膜に付着し、喉を焼き尽くして穴を開けようとする。刺激に激しく咳き込んでしまい、焼けた口を覆う。袖に数滴の血がついてしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}口の中に入れた瞬間、液体は酸に変わった。液体が喉の粘膜に付着し、喉を焼き尽くして穴を開けようとする。刺激に激しく咳き込んでしまい、焼けた口を覆う。袖に数滴の血がついてしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sobald sich das Getränk in deinem Mund befindet, scheint es sich in Säure zu verwandeln – die Flüssigkeit haftet an deinem Gaumen und versucht, sich hindurchzubrennen. Du bekommst einen schweren Hustenanfall und hältst eine Hand vor deinen brennenden Mund – auf deinem Ärmel bleiben einige Blutstropfen zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobald sich das Getränk in deinem Mund befindet, scheint es sich in Säure zu verwandeln – die Flüssigkeit haftet an deinem Gaumen und versucht, sich hindurchzubrennen. Du bekommst einen schweren Hustenanfall und hältst eine Hand vor deinen brennenden Mund – auf deinem Ärmel bleiben einige Blutstropfen zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En touchant votre langue, le liquide semble se transformer en acide : il se colle aux parois de votre gorge, qu'il tente de immédiatement de ronger. Vous toussez violemment en portant la main à votre bouche en feu, avant de remarquer plusieurs gouttes de sang sur votre manche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En touchant votre langue, le liquide semble se transformer en acide : il se colle aux parois de votre gorge, qu'il tente de immédiatement de ronger. Vous toussez violemment en portant la main à votre bouche en feu, avant de remarquer plusieurs gouttes de sang sur votre manche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İçki, ağzına aldığın anda sanki aside dönüşüyor. Sıvı, yakarak delmeye çalışır gibi boğaz duvarlarına yapışıyor. Yanan ağzını kapatarak şiddetle öksürüyorsun. Giysinin koluna birkaç damla kan bulaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once inside your mouth, the drink seems to turn to acid — the liquid sticks to the lining of your throat and tries to burn right through it. You cough violently, covering your burning mouth — leaving a few drops of blood on your sleeve.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sanki içkiyi ağzına aldığın anda aside dönüşüyor... Sıvı, boğaz duvarlarına yapışıyor, sanki yakarak boğazını delecek gibi. Yanan ağzını kapatarak şiddetle öksürüyorsun... Giysinin koluna birkaç damla kan bulaşıyor.{/n}
